spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Exul's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

1e: {@spell conjure elemental} (earth or fire elemental only)

trait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If Exul dies, his body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only the equipment he was wearing or carrying.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Exul makes two handaxe attacks or uses his Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}17 (5d6) fire damage.
